text: Geoffrey Frank Power (7 April 1899 – 1963) was an English professional footballer who played as an inside forward for Sunderland. ==References== Category:1899 births Category:1963 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Sunderland, Tyne and Wear Category:Footballers from Tyne and Wear Category:English footballers Category:Association football inside forwards Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Blackpool F.C. players Category:Darwen F.C. players Category:Fleetwood Town F.C. players Category:Denaby United F.C. players Category:Eston United F.C. players Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Date of death missing
title: Geoff Power
